ðŸ“– Summary: Hercules is an open-source testing agent that enables codeless automation of UI, API, Security, Accessibility, and Visual validations. It allows users to write tests in simple Gherkin steps, which are then automatically executed, making end-to-end testing more accessible and efficient. Hercules aims to democratize test automation and empower teams to deliver better software.
